message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think this is a reasonable offer considering I'm the one making the first proposal.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I believe a 60-40 split in my favor is more fair considering the inflation dynamic.  Let's see if you agree.
Considering the inflation, my initial 60-40 offer is now less valuable to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer. Let's split it 55-45 and be done with it.
